original_title: Metallica: Freeze 'Em All - Live in Antarctica
overview: On December 8, 2013 we set a world record by becoming the first and only band in history to perform concerts on all seven continents in under a year! Watch us play for a small group of fans and research scientists in a little dome at the Carlini Argentine Base in Antarctica! Thanks to Coca-Cola for putting it all together and to Burton for keeping us warm!
title: Metallica: Freeze 'Em All - Live in Antarctica
